org.eclipse.draw2d
Class AbstractConnectionAnchor

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.draw2d.ConnectionAnchorBase
      org.eclipse.draw2d.AbstractConnectionAnchor
All Implemented Interfaces:
AncestorListener, ConnectionAnchor
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChopboxAnchor, EllipseAnchor
public abstract class AbstractConnectionAnchor
extends ConnectionAnchorBase
implements AncestorListener

Provides support for anchors which depend on a figure for thier location.

getReferencePoint

public Point getReferencePoint()
Returns the point which is used as the reference by this AbstractConnectionAnchor. It is generally dependent on the Figure which is the owner of this AbstractConnectionAnchor.

Specified by:

The reference point of this anchor

removeAnchorListener

public void removeAnchorListener(AnchorListener listener)
Removes the given listener from this anchor. If all the listeners are removed, then this anchor removes itself from its owner.

Specified by:
removeAnchorListener in interface ConnectionAnchor
Overrides:
removeAnchorListener in class ConnectionAnchorBase
Parameters:

Since:
